mapper.sql: lbi.id as lbi_id, create_by, create_time, modified_by, modified_time, short_name, length, station_num,xiangmutype_id, quduan_num, dianmahua_num, axle_points, info_num, technology_state,open_time, guarantee_period_information, auxiliary_product_information, manufacturer_information,file_name, file_path,modify_situation,lbi.tid as lbi_tid, t.tid as t_tid,tlj_name, ax.id as ax_id,xiangmuleixing
mro_line_base_information lbi inner join mro_tieluju t on lbi.tid = t.tid inner join mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_xiangmutype ax on lbi.xiangmutype_id = ax.id
mapper.select: select did, dwd_name from mro_dianwuduan d inner join mro_line_base_information_unit lbiu on lbiu.unit_id = d.did where lbiu.line_base_information_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
